eu.wauz.wauzcore.system

Class ChatFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.ChatFormatter

  • public class ChatFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for formatting and sending all chat messages, to their receivers.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • share

        public static void share(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                         org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        Formats and sends an item stack message from a player to the global chat.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who sent the item stack message.
        itemStack - The item stack to show in the message.
        See Also:
        UnicodeUtils.shareChatItem(ItemStack, String)

      • getRankPrefix

        public static java.lang.String getRankPrefix(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets the rank prefix of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get the prefix for.
        Returns:

      • getGamemodeSuffix

        Gets the gamemode suffix of a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get the suffix for.
        Returns:

      • validateGroupMessage

        public static boolean validateGroupMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                           java.lang.Object groupObject,
                                           java.lang.String message,
                                           boolean isGuild)
        Checks if a group message can be sent.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who sent the message.
        groupObject - The group or guild that should receive the message.
        message - The message they sent.
        isGuild - If it is sent to guild (used for error message).
        Returns:
        If the message is valid.
